info.name: OTT Streaming Platform API
info.description:
Complete collection of OTT Streaming Platform API endpoints

**Organization:**
- Media APIs: Manage video/audio content (pre-recorded HLS or external streams)
- Stream APIs: Manage streaming sessions assigned to Contest events

**Features:**
- Media can be pre-recorded (HLS master.m3u8) or external stream URLs
- Each media has uniqueId (integer, auto-incremented) and hashcode (xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx format)
- Streams are assigned to Contest events
- Stream uniqueId is integer (auto-incremented)
- Media can be reused by multiple streams (one-to-many relationship)
- Status transitions: scheduled→live/cancelled, live→finished/cancelled

**When adding new requests:**
1. Add Media requests in the "Media APIs" folder
2. Add Stream requests in the "Stream APIs" folder
3. Update src/routes/mediaRoutes.js or src/routes/streamRoutes.js if needed
4. Update ARCHITECTURE.md if needed

item.name: Media APIs
item.description:
REST APIs for managing Media entities (video/audio content)

**Base URL:** {{media_base_url}}

**Media Types:**
- pre-recorded: HLS format with master.m3u8 URL
- external: Stream URL from external source

**Auto-generated Fields:**
- uniqueId: Integer (auto-incremented, starts from 1)
- hashcode: xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx format (hexadecimal)

**When adding new Media requests:**
1. Add your request in this folder
2. Use appropriate HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
3. Set Content-Type: application/json
4. Add body as JSON for POST/PUT requests

request.description:
Create a new pre-recorded media with HLS master.m3u8 URL.

**Required Fields:**
- type: "pre-recorded"
- url: Must be a valid URL ending with master.m3u8
- name: Media name

**Optional Fields:**
- description: Media description
- duration: Duration in seconds
- metadata: Additional metadata object

**Returns:** Created media with auto-generated uniqueId (integer) and hashcode

Create a new external stream media.

**Required Fields:**
- type: "external"
- url: Valid stream URL (any format)
- name: Media name

**Optional Fields:**
- description: Media description
- duration: Duration in seconds
- metadata: Additional metadata object

**Returns:** Created media with auto-generated uniqueId (integer) and hashcode

Get list of all media with pagination.

**Default:** limit=100, skip=0

**Returns:** Paginated list of media with pagination info
Get media list with custom pagination
Filter media by type (pre-recorded)
Filter media by type (external)
Get a single media by its uniqueId (integer)
Get a single media by its hashcode (format: xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx)

Update media fields.

**Note:** uniqueId and hashcode cannot be updated.

**Optional Fields:**
- type: "pre-recorded" or "external"
- url: Media URL
- name: Media name
- description: Media description
- duration: Duration in seconds
- metadata: Additional metadata object

Delete a media.

**Validation:** Will fail if media is used by any streams. Check error message for details.

item.name: Stream APIs
item.description:
REST APIs for managing Stream entities (streaming sessions)

**Base URL:** {{stream_base_url}}

**Stream Status:**
- scheduled: Stream is scheduled
- live: Stream is currently live
- finished: Stream has finished
- cancelled: Stream was cancelled

**Status Transitions:**
- scheduled → live or cancelled
- live → finished or cancelled
- finished → (no transitions)
- cancelled → (no transitions)

**Auto-generated Fields:**
- uniqueId: Integer (auto-incremented, starts from 1)

**Relationships:**
- Stream references Media (one-to-many: one media can be used by multiple streams)
- Stream references Contest by contestId
- Stream responses include populated media data

**When adding new Stream requests:**
1. Add your request in this folder
2. Use appropriate HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
3. Set Content-Type: application/json
4. Add body as JSON for POST/PUT requests

request.description:
Create a new stream.

**Required Fields:**
- mediaId: Media uniqueId (integer) or ObjectId (must exist)
- contestId: Contest ID (integer, stored as-is, no validation against Contests collection)
- title: Stream title

**Optional Fields:**
- description: Stream description
- status: "scheduled" (default), "live", "finished", "cancelled"
- startTime: ISO 8601 date string
- endTime: ISO 8601 date string
- thumbnail: Thumbnail URL
- metadata: Additional metadata object

**Returns:** Created stream with auto-generated uniqueId (integer) and populated media data

Get list of all streams with pagination.

**Default:** limit=100, skip=0

**Returns:** Paginated list of streams with populated media data
Get streams list with custom pagination
Filter streams by contestId
Filter streams by status (scheduled, live, finished, cancelled)
Filter streams by mediaId (uniqueId as integer or ObjectId)
Filter streams by multiple criteria (contestId, status, pagination)
Get a single stream by its uniqueId (integer) with populated media data
Get all streams for a specific contest with populated media data

Update stream fields.

**Note:** uniqueId cannot be updated.

**Status Transitions:**
- Valid: scheduled→live/cancelled, live→finished/cancelled
- Invalid transitions will return 400 error

**Optional Fields:**
- mediaId: Media uniqueId (integer) or ObjectId (must exist)
- contestId: Contest ID (integer, stored as-is, no validation)
- title: Stream title
- description: Stream description
- status: Stream status (validated transitions)
- startTime: ISO 8601 date string
- endTime: ISO 8601 date string
- thumbnail: Thumbnail URL
- viewerCount: Number (non-negative)
- metadata: Additional metadata object
Delete a stream
